description: I was born in Ukraine. I moved to the US when I was 4 years old. I grew up in the Philadelphia area.
alt: An image of the Ukrainian flag, with blue on top and yellow on the bottom.

description: In college, I decided to study music and music education. I played classical guitar for recitals, weddings, and other events.
alt: An image of a classical guitar.

description: After college, I lived in France for 2 years where I taught English in public elementary schools.
alt: A panoramic view of Nice, France. There are red tiled roofs, a vast blue sea, and rolling hills in the background.

description: After returning to the US, I became a high school ESL teacher in Philadelphia, where I currently work.
alt: The Philadelphia skyline at night. In the foreground is the Schuylkill river and the trail.

description: Seeking a change and wanting to further challenge myself, I decided to pursue a Master's in Software Development at BU.
alt: A red sign saying Boston University with people walking in the background.
